panels.content: The SLO (service level objective) and other metrics displayed on this dashboard are for informational purposes only.
panels.description: The SLO (service level objective) and other metrics displayed on this dashboard are for informational purposes only.
panels.title: Notice

panels.description: How many percent of requests (both read and write) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Availability (30d) > 99.000%

panels.description: How much error budget is left looking at our 0.990% availability guarantees?
panels.title: ErrorBudget (30d) > 99.000%

panels.description: How many percent of read requests (LIST,GET) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Read Availability (30d)

panels.description: How many read requests (LIST,GET) per second do the apiservers get by code?
panels.title: Read SLI - Requests

panels.description: How many percent of read requests (LIST,GET) per second are returned with errors (5xx)?
panels.title: Read SLI - Errors

panels.description: How many seconds is the 99th percentile for reading (LIST|GET) a given resource?
panels.title: Read SLI - Duration

panels.description: How many percent of write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) in 30 days have been answered successfully and fast enough?
panels.title: Write Availability (30d)

panels.description: How many write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) per second do the apiservers get by code?
panels.title: Write SLI - Requests

panels.description: How many percent of write requests (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) per second are returned with errors (5xx)?
panels.title: Write SLI - Errors

panels.description: How many seconds is the 99th percentile for writing (POST|PUT|PATCH|DELETE) a given resource?
panels.title: Write SLI - Duration
Rate of TCP Retransmits out of all sent segments
Rate of TCP SYN Retransmits out of all retransmits

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(workqueue_queue_duration_seconds_bucket{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kube-controller-manager", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) by (__tenant_id__, instance, name, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kube-controller-manager", instance=~"$instance", verb="POST"}[$__rate_interval])) by (verb, url, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kube-controller-manager", instance=~"$instance", verb="GET"}[$__rate_interval])) by (verb, url, le))

panels.title: Average Container Bandwidth by Namespace: Received
Average Container Bandwidth by Namespace: Transmitted

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", container!="", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", container!="", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_cache{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_swap{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by (container)

ceil(sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(avg(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

panels.title: Average Container Bandwidth by Pod: Received

targets.expr:
(avg(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", __tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{__tenant_id__="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(storage_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, operation_name, volume_plugin, le))

(
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})))
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})))
)
sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})))

max without(instance,node) (
(
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})
  -
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})
)
/
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})
* 100)
sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})))

(
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_inodes{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})))
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})))
)

max without(instance,node) (
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})
/
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_inodes{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$volume"})
* 100)
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kube-proxy", instance=~"$instance", verb="GET"}[$__rate_interval])) by (verb, url, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kube-scheduler", instance=~"$instance", verb="POST"}[$__rate_interval])) by (verb, url, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{__tenant_id__="$cluster", job="kube-scheduler", instance=~"$instance", verb="GET"}[$__rate_interval])) by (verb, url, le))
